title: CAB पर संसद में कपिल सिब्बल के भाषण को ऑपइंडिया ने गलत रिपोर्ट किया
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: I rise to oppose #CABBill. The two-nation theory wasn’t ours, it was perpetrated by Savarkar & #BRAmbedkar agreed too. Congress believes in one nation. I want HM to withdraw 2-nation statement: Kapil Sibal, Congress, in #RajyaSabha#CitizenshipBill LIVE: https://t.co/bGw3YAD0V1pic.twitter.com/gNnTyfViOm
